adhocDataView.name: 06__Sales_Mix_by_Gender
adhocDataView.label: 06. Sales Mix by Gender
adhocDataView.description: Sample HTML5 stacked bar chart from a Topic showing Sales Mix by Gender across Countries and Product Families

</entry> <entry key="defaultMask" /> <entry key="kind"> <string>DIMENSION</string> </entry> <entry key="defaultAgg"> <string>CountAll</string> </entry> </propertyMap> </field> <field id="the_year" type="java.lang.Integer"> <propertyMap> <entry key="aggregateExpression"> <string>Sum(the_year)</string> </entry> <entry key="aggregateType"> <string>java.lang.Long</string> </entry> <entry key="adhoc.display"> <string>Year</string> </entry> <entry key="defaultMask"> <string>#,##0</string> </entry> <entry key="kind"> <string>MEASURE</string> </entry> <entry key="defaultAgg"> <string>Sum(month_of_year)</string> </entry> <entry key="aggregateType"> <string>java.lang.Long</string> </entry> <entry key="adhoc.display"> <string>Month</string> </entry> <entry key="defaultMask"> <string>#,##0</string> </entry> <entry key="kind"> <string>MEASURE</string> </entry> <entry key="defaultAgg"> <string>Sum</string> </entry> </propertyMap> </field> <field id="day_of_month" type="java.lang.Integer"> <propertyMap> <entry key="aggregateExpression"> <string>Sum(day_of_month)</string> </entry> <entry key="aggregateType"> <string>java.lang.Long</string> </entry> <entry key="adhoc.display"> <string>Day of Month</string> </entry> <entry key="defaultMask"> <string>#,##0</string> </entry> <entry key="kind"> <string>MEASURE</string> </entry> <entry key="defaultAgg"> <string>Sum</string> </entry> </propertyMap> </field> <field id="the_date" type="java.sql.Timestamp"> <propertyMap> <entry key="aggregateExpression"> <string>CountAll(the_date)</string> </entry> <entry key="aggregateType"> <string>java.lang.Long</string> </entry> <entry key="adhoc.display"> <string>Date</string> </entry> <entry key="defaultMask"> <string>medium,hide</string> </entry> <entry key="kind"> <string>DIMENSION</string> </entry> <entry key="defaultAgg"> <string>CountAll</string> </entry> </propertyMap> </field> <field id="store_sales" type="java.lang.Double"> <propertyMap> <entry key="aggregateExpression"> <string>Sum(store_sales)</string> </entry> <entry key="aggregateType"> <string>java.lang.Double</string> </entry> <entry key="adhoc.display"> <string>Store Sales</string> </entry> <entry key="defaultMask"> <string>#,##0.00</string> </entry> <entry key="kind"> <string>MEASURE</string> </entry> <entry key="defaultAgg"> <string>Sum</string> </entry> </propertyMap> </field> <field id="store_cost" type="java.lang.Double"> <propertyMap> <entry key="aggregateExpression"> <string>Sum(store_cost)</string> </entry> <entry key="aggregateType"> <string>java.lang.Double</string> </entry> <entry key="adhoc.display"> <string>Store Cost</string> </entry> <entry key="defaultMask"> <string>#,##0.00</string> </entry> <entry key="kind"> <string>MEASURE</string> </entry> <entry key="defaultAgg"> <string>Sum</string> </entry> </propertyMap> </field> <field id="unit_sales" type="java.lang.Double"> <propertyMap> <entry key="aggregateExpression"> <string>Sum(unit_sales)</string> </entry> <entry key="aggregateType"> <string>java.lang.Double</string> </entry> <entry key="adhoc.display"> <string>Unit Sales</string> </entry> <entry key="defaultMask"> <string>#,##0.00</string> </entry> <entry key="kind"> <string>MEASURE</string> </entry> <entry key="defaultAgg"> <string>Sum</string> </entry> </propertyMap> </field> </fieldList> <query>select c.city as c_city, c.state_province as c_state_province, c.country as c_country, c.gender as c_gender, p.product_name, pc.product_family, pc.product_department, pc.product_category, pc.product_subcategory, st.store_name, st.store_city, st.store_state, st.store_country, t.the_date, t.day_of_month, t.month_of_year, t.quarter, t.the_year, s.store_sales, s.store_cost, s.unit_sales from sales_fact_1998 s join customer c on (c.customer_id = s.customer_id) join time_by_day t on (t.time_id = s.time_id) join product p on (p.product_id = s.product_id) join product_class pc on (pc.product_class_id = p.product_class_id) join store st on (st.store_id = s.store_id)</query> </jrQueryDataSet> </source> </memory> </resources> </query>
